title: USDM emerges as Cardano inaugural fiat-anchored stablecoin in a buoyant market
description:
The Cardano blockchain has welcomed its first fiat-backed stablecoin with the introduction of the USDM by Mehen Finance on March 17. According to the project: “USDM will slowly be arriving on-chain the week of the 18th.” The launch of this stablecoin comes almost two years after the release of its white paper. title: GiganticRebirth wins bid for original Dogwifhat meme for $4 million
description: Influential trader GCR purchases the original Dogwifhat meme for 1,210 ETH, causing a 10% WIF token price increase.

title: Over 93% of Bitcoin Mined Ahead of Fourth Halving, Signaling New Era of Scarcity
description: As of the current moment, 93.6% of bitcoin’s total supply has already been mined, leaving only 1.34 million bitcoins remaining to be extracted. After the upcoming halving event, the issuance rate of the leading digital currency will decelerate, significantly reducing its availability more than ever before. title: ETHFI token’s strong start fades with over 20% drop post-debut
description: Ether.Fi, known for its liquid restaking protocol, has officially launched its governance token, ETHFI, starting at an opening price of $4.13. This follows the token’s distribution through an airdrop and a Binance Launchpad round.  Despite the initial interest, ETHFI saw a decline of over 20%, with its current trading price at $3.41 on Binance at […]

title: Analyst Predicts Breakout Rallies for BNB and One Ethereum Rival – Here Are His Targets
description:
A closely followed crypto analyst says that BNB, the native token for the BNB Chain ecosystem, is one of the most solid high-cap plays for the current market correction.
